content.prompt: In the short run, a profit-maximizing firm should shut down if which of the following is true?

choices.label: It is not making an economic profit.
It is not making a normal profit.
Its total revenue is less than its total cost.
Its product price is less than its average variable cost.
Its product price is greater than its average variable cost but less than its average total cost.
